actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover, under the hospital insurance program established by part A thereof, inpatient hospital services provided outside the United States to individuals insured under such program.

summary.text: Provides for coverage under the hospital insurance program established by part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act (Medicare) of inpatient hospital services provided outside the United States to individuals insured under such program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover, under the hospital insurance program established by part A thereof, inpatient hospital services provided outside the United States to individuals insured under such program.
